items.titolo: This might be the best way to get medical advice from ChatGPT - and it's free to use
items.descrizione: ChatGPT Health is OpenAI's latest 'dedicated experience' that draws on your medical records to answer all your health questions. Here's how it works.

items.titolo: Google Pixel Watch 3, il prezzo continua a scendere: lo sconto è del 53%
items.descrizione: Amazon sconta del 53% il Google Pixel Watch 3 da 45mm, smartwatch con Gemini e sensori per il monitoraggio di sport e salute (anche ECG).

items.titolo: How Claude Code Is Reshaping Software—and Anthropic
items.descrizione: WIRED spoke with Boris Cherny, head of Claude Code, about how the viral coding tool is changing the way Anthropic works.
